    • it.polimi.deib.p2pchat.discovery.MainActivity

extends java.lang.Object
    Main Activity.

    Created by Stefano Cappa on 04/02/15.

    • Method Detail

      • reconnectToService

        public void reconnectToService(WiFiP2pService service)
        Method called by WiFiChatFragment using the WiFiChatFragment.AutomaticReconnectionListener interface, implemented here, by this class. If the wifiP2pService is null, this method return directly, without doing anything.
        Parameters:
        service - A WiFiP2pService object that represents the device in which you want to connect.

      • forceDiscoveryStop

        public void forceDiscoveryStop()
        Method that force to stop the discovery phase of the wifi direct protocol, clear the ServiceList, update the discovery's menu item and remove all the registered Services.

      • restartDiscovery

        public void restartDiscovery()
        Method to restarts the discovery phase and to update the UI.

      • tryToConnectToAService

        public void tryToConnectToAService(int position)
        Method called by WiFiP2pServicesFragment with the WiFiP2pServicesFragment.DeviceClickListener interface, when the user click on an element of the recyclerview. To be precise, the call comes from WiFiServicesAdapter to the WiFiP2pServicesFragment using WiFiP2pServicesFragment.DeviceClickListener to check if the clickedPosition is correct and finally calls this method.
        Parameters:
        position - int that represents the lists's clicked position inside the WiFiP2pServicesFragment

      • setDisableAllChatManagers

        public void setDisableAllChatManagers()
        Method to disable all ChatManager's. This method iterates over all ChatManagers inside the WiFiChatFragment's list (in TabFragment ) and calls "setDisable(true);".

      • setTabFragmentToPage

        public void setTabFragmentToPage(int numPage)
        Method to set the current item of the ViewPager used in TabFragment.
        Parameters:
        numPage - int that represents the index of the tab to show.

      • addColorActiveTabs

        public void addColorActiveTabs(boolean grayScale)
        This Method changes the color of all messages in WiFiChatFragment.
        Parameters:
        grayScale - a boolean that if is true removes all colors inside WiFiChatFragment, if false activates all colors only in the active WiFiChatFragment, based on the value of tabNum to select the correct tab in TabFragment.

      • setDeviceNameWithReflection

        public void setDeviceNameWithReflection(java.lang.String deviceName)
        This method sets the name of this LocalP2PDevice in the UI and inside the device. In this way, all other devices can see this updated name during the discovery phase. Attention, WifiP2pManager uses an annotation called @hide to hide the method setDeviceName, in Android SDK. This method uses Java reflection to call this hidden method.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - String that represents the visible device name of a device, during discovery.

      • onConnectionInfoAvailable

        public void onConnectionInfoAvailable(WifiP2pInfo p2pInfo)
        Method called automatically by Android.

      • handleMessage

        public boolean handleMessage(Message msg)
        Method called automatically by Android when ChatManager calls handler.obtainMessage(***).sendToTarget().
